column4: 2020 is the day that the Ministry of Public Works and Transport  launched its own unique registration number for vehicles. They can be arranged at Aeon Mall Sen Sok 2.------The Ministry of Public Works has stated that this unique registration number can be alphabetical or numeric
column5: with no more than 8 digits or numbers. Above is the word Cambodia in Khmer and the bottom is Cambodia in English. ------For more details watch the video below.------អបអរសាទរ!!! លេខចុះបញ្ជីពិសេសផ្ទាល់ខ្លួនសម្រាប់រថយន្ត នឹងដាក់ឲ្យដំណើរការជាផ្លូវការ នាថ្ងៃទី០៧ មករា ឆ្នាំ២០២០ នេះហើយ!!!:::ជួបគ្នាឆាប់ៗនេះ នៅផ្សារទំនើប អ៊ីអន ២ សែនសុខ
